description:
At Tange`s instructions, the members of WUG begin living together in a dorm.
Furthermore, when they hear about her plan to hold a national tour, the girls are shocked but also excited.
In order to increase the group`s popularity, Tange aggressively begins assigning individual work to the members of WUG.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: ここが私たちのホーム
